answers.answer: Yes they can find out sex they told me my girl was a girl at 12, 21, 33 weeks. I'm a bigger mama and I started feeling kicks around 16-18 weeks they got real strong at about 22 you will def know when to notlay on ur tummy cause it'll be really uncomfortable believe me I weighed 240 prepregnancy and I now at 34 weeks weigh 295... I have preeclampsia and I have yet to find a way to avoid the weight gain I eat very healthy and avoid salt as best as possible

I'm 22 weeks feeling pretty good!Yes you can find out the gender before 20 weeks. I did at 15 weeks and 5 days through a regular ultrasound by my doctor. I had them check again at 20 weeks and they were still right.You should be feeling kicks around 22 or 24 weeks.. I believe. I haven't felt any yet.You'll know when to stop sleeping on your belly because it won't be comfortable anymore. .. however some women are almost due and still sleep on their tummy. It's all about what's comfortable to you

question: Today I am 15 weeks- meaning next week I will be 4 months! How is everyone feeling? A couple of questions. If I had an ultrasound done before my 20 week apt. could they find out the sex? My sickness was SO bad as I had hyperglycemia or whatever up until right after I hit the second trimester so I feel so much better- basically no nausea. I am a heavier set mama so eager to know when I can feel kicks and stuff. I have been laying on my belly a lot during sleep and was told its okay and that I will know when to stop doing that, but how? lol.
title: 15 weeks today! 175 days to go. Read!
